main.name: José Ramón Martínez Riveiro
main.description: Software Engineer. MSc in Computer Science
main.bio: m José, a software engineer with 4+ years of professional experience and a strong academic background, holding both a Bachelor's and a Master's degree in Computer Science. I've taught Software Systems Quality as a professor, conducted research at UCLM, and spoken at several technical conferences. Currently, I lead the Infrastructure and e-Government team, actively contributing to system development and architectural decisions.

work.title: Software Engineer II
work.description: • Lead the Infrastructure and Electronic Administration team, focused on developing and consolidating common and cross-functional services. • Manage and evolve the centralized authentication system for the Ministry of Agriculture of JCCM (OAuth 2.0), with annual audits, integration in >60 applications, and usage by >20,000 unique monthly users. • Implement and oversee ETL management systems, with over 70 scheduled daily executions, optimizing data flows and traceability. • Technical direction and production deployment of new procedures, ensuring evolution of the technology framework and compliance with electronic administration regulations.

work.title: Software Engineer I
work.description: • Design and implementation of layered architectures, applying SOLID principles. • Development of the management system for Agri-Food Industries and technical report generator for processing aid and subsidy applications. • Design of onboarding process, facilitating integration of new personnel and ensuring compliance with development standards.

work.title: Substitute professor
work.description: • Substitute professor for Software Systems Quality in the University Degree of Computer Science at University of Castilla-La Mancha.

work.title: Researcher/Research support staff
work.description: • Research in interactive systems, enhancing the recommendation system for breast cancer patients using audio and images • Article: https://doi.org/10.1177/15691861231206489.

work.title: Research Fellow | Software Engineer
work.description: • System to improve the quality of life for breast cancer patients. • Content management system for educational materials within the context of the European project LanGuide.

work.title: Software Developer Intern
work.description: • Developed a web-based monitoring app using domestic sensors.
